channel.title: Stm on Data for Democracy Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Stm on Data for Democracy Lab

item.title: Debating the Issues?
item.description: Debate Content, Part II The prior post on debate content didn’t suggest much policy or issue-oriented actual debate. Nevertheless, here’s one last attempt to get at the substance of the presidential election debates. I’m starting by estimating a mixed membership clustering algorithm, a topic model, to see if identifiable topics arise from the word usage in the debates. The structural topic model, provided in the stm package, will estimate a chosen number of topics, provide the document proportions for each topic, and the word probabilities for each topic.
